title: Establish Design
description: A site I helped create for a client to show off their architectural and interior designs. We ended up migrating the site from Netlify CMS to Contentful after realizing that Contentful would be a better match for our needs.

title: American Curb
description: American Curb is a local landscaping business that I designed and developed.

title: Vuer
description: My first Vue application. I wanted to learn Vue so I created this GitHub profile viewing app.

title: Utah Pumpkins
description: Every year my family grows and carves hundreds of pumpkins so I wanted to build a site to show them off. It was also a great opportunity to become more familiar with Contentful.

title: Calldrip
description: While working at Calldrip I helped create a product called Dynamic Numbers which would dynamically show each unique visitor to our clients website a unique phone number. Those phone numbers could then be tracked for precise customer tracking.

title: Clearlink
description: At Clearlink I've worked on an assortment of sites including Vivint Source, USDISH, Your Local Security, and Frontier Bundles.
